cards.name: Host of the Riverlands
cards.text: Bestow (3). No attachments. Reaction: After a House Tully character you control gains power, discard 1 gold from Host of the Riverlands to have that character gain 1 power. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Godswood
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, if there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed, kneel Godswood to draw X cards. X is the claim value on your revealed plot card.

cards.name: Mace Tyrell
cards.text: Reaction: After Mace Tyrell is knelt, draw 2 cards. Then, choose a card in your hand and place it on top of your deck.

cards.name: This Must Be Answered Fiercely!
cards.text: Reaction: After 3 or more characters are declared as attackers in a challenge against you, search your deck for a [tyrell] character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Septon Cellador
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Septon Cellador to choose an opponent. That player must choose and discard a character from his or her hand unless he or she reveals a hand containing no characters.

cards.name: The Crow is a Tricksy Bird
cards.text: Plot Action: Kneel your faction card to choose an opponent and look at his or her plot deck. Choose 1 plot in that deck. That player must reveal that plot as his or her next plot card, if able.

cards.name: The Bastard of Nightsong
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge in which The Bastard of Nightsong is participating, move 1 power from the losing opponent’s faction card to your own.

cards.name: King at the Wall
cards.text: Unique [baratheon] character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge in which attached character is participating, draw 1 card for each out-of-faction location you control.

cards.name: Qyburn
cards.text: Reaction: After a character is killed, kneel Qyburn to draw 2 cards. Then, choose and discard 1 card from your hand.

cards.name: A Plot Against The Queen
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge, return a character with 1 or more power to your hand to choose a participating character with 1 or more power and return it to its owner’s hand.

cards.name: Saltcliffe Sailor
cards.text: Bestow (3). Each character you control with 1 or more gold gains stealth. Action: Move 1 gold from Saltcliffe Sailor to a non-[greyjoy] character you control.

cards.name: Driftwood Cudgel
cards.text: Drowned God character only. Attached character gets +1 STR for each character in your dead pile. Interrupt: When attached character is killed, move Driftwood Cudgel to another eligible character. That character gains 1 power.

cards.name: Raiding Khalasar
cards.text: No attachments. Pillage. While Raiding Khalasar is attacking, if you control an attacking Bloodrider character, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

cards.name: To Go Forward You Must Go Back
cards.text: Dominance Action: Each player may shuffle his or her hand (of at least 1 card) into his or her deck to draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Host of the Boneway
cards.text:
Intimidate. No attachments.
Host of the Boneway gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile.

cards.name: Someone Always Tells
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event or triggered plot ability would initiate, cancel those effects.

cards.name: Mya Stone
cards.text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] or [intrigue] challenge in which you are the defending player, kneel Mya Stone to apply [power] claim instead.

cards.name: The Great Sept of Baelor
cards.text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After a character enters play, kneel The Great Sept of Baelor and discard 1 gold from it to treat that character’s printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits) until the end of the round.

cards.name: The Seven-Pointed Star
cards.text: Attached character gains The Seven trait. Marshaling Action: Kneel attached character to reduce the cost of the next The Seven card you marshal this phase by 2.

cards.name: You Win Or You Die
cards.text: When Revealed: Draw 2 cards.
